title: Predict Food Grain Production Trends Using Area and Yield Data
problem_statement: Forecast annual food grain production across India using area and yield estimates from 2015-2024. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness with 2022-2024 data fully populated. Focus on INR-based metrics where applicable.

join_plan.notes: Both datasets share [Crop, Season] composite key. Area metrics align across files for temporal analysis.

transform_ideas: Calculate 3-year rolling averages for area and yield
feature_plan.handling_missingness: Use median imputation for 2020-21/2021-22 gaps with forward-fill validation

validation_plan: Time-series cross-validation with 80% training (2015-2022) and 20% testing (2023-2024). Validate against actual 2023-24 production values.
quality_checks: Verify ≥65% completeness in all feature columns
Check for season-specific crop production seasonality patterns

excluded_columns.reason: High null fraction (62.5%) in export dataset
